Package org.codehaus.groovy.grails.plugins.searchable.compass.search

Interface Summary
SearchableCompassQueryBuilder A thread-safe Compass query builder
SearchableCompassQueryBuilderOptionsHelper A helper for applying query options
SearchableHitCollector  
SearchableSearchResultFactory  
 

Class Summary
AbstractSearchableCompassQueryBuilder  
AbstractSearchableHitCollector  
CountOnlyHitCollector Counts the hits and returns that count
DefaultSearchableCompassQueryBuilder The default query builder strategy
DefaultSearchableEveryHitCollector Collects every hit in the given hits
DefaultSearchableSubsetHitCollector Collects hits within a range denoted by offset and max
DefaultSearchableTopHitCollector A hit collector returning only the top (first) hit
DefaultSearchMethod The default search method implementation
DefaultSearchMethod.SearchCompassCallback  
DefaultStringQuerySearchableCompassQueryBuilder  
DefaultSuggestQueryMethod  
DefaultSuggestQueryMethod.SuggestedQueryStringBuilder  
DefaultSuggestQueryMethod.SuggestQueryCompassCallback  
DefaultTermFreqsMethod Implements the SearchableService and domain class termFreqs() method
DefaultTermFreqsMethod.TermFreqsArgs Helper to parse the method arguments
DefaultTermFreqsMethod.TermFreqsCompassCallback A builder that builds the term freqs based on the properties set Note instances of this class are not thread-safe
GroovyCompassQueryBuilder A Groovy CompassQuery builder, taking nested closures and dynamic method invocation in the Groovy-builder style Note: Instances of this class are NOT thread-safe: you should create one for the duration of your CompassSession then discard it
MoreLikeThisCompassQueryBuilder  
SearchableCompassQueryBuilderClassOptionHelper Helper dealing with a "class" query builder query option
SearchableCompassQueryBuilderSortOptionHelper Post-processes a query to add sort
SearchableHitsOnlySearchResultFactory Returns just search hits as the result
SearchableSubsetSearchResultFactory Returns a "paged" search result object for the given hits NOT thread-safe
